#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;
int main(){
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	int a[n];
	double e,o;
	e=0;
	o=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		cin>>a[i];
		if(a[i]%2==0){
			e++;
		}
		else{
			o++;
		}
	}
	double ans = e-o;
	cout<<abs(ans)<<endl;
	return 0;
}
